  • Constructor Details

    • BigShot

      public BigShot(Direction direction)
      Constructs a BigShot object with a specified initial direction. This constructor invokes the superclass's constructor to set the direction and initializes the dangerous object type to "bigShot".
      Parameters:
      direction - the initial direction of the BigShot. Must be a valid direction as defined in the Direction enum (NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST).

    • BigShot

      public BigShot()
      Default constructor for the BigShot class. Initializes an instance of BigShot without setting any specific direction or initial configuration. Sets the dangerous object type to "bigShot".

  • Method Details

    • startAttack

      public void startAttack(PlayerChoicesDataStructure playerChoices, HowToDefend card)
      Initiates an attack on a player using the current instance of a BigShot.
      Specified by:
      startAttack in class Shot
      Parameters:
      playerChoices - the structure containing the player's choices or actions
      card - the card instance representing the sender of the shot

    • getDangerousObjType

      public String getDangerousObjType()
      Retrieves the type of the dangerous object associated with this instance. The returned value represents the specific type of dangerous object (e.g., "bigShot", "smallShot", "bigMeteorite", "smallMeteorite").
      Specified by:
      getDangerousObjType in class DangerousObj
      Returns:
      a String representing the type of the dangerous object.
